review: Professionally attired and demeanored. Patient listener.  Proficient in subject matter and clinical judgement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Naveen patiently listened to my problem. This was satisfying. He understood the  problem and advised me the treatment. The medicines prescribed has given me good relief within 24 hours. I am sure I will be well soon. I liked his friendliness and patience with the patient. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I first saw him for foot drop I had due to Gbs, he first explained the issue and set my expectations right.

Recently I went to him for lower back pain, he immediately diagnosed the issue, confirmed with xray. He then prescribed pain killers, supplements, gel and also a belt so as ensure that the issue will be resolved one way or the other....rather than drag it across multiple consultations

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Doctor enquired about the history, explained and set expectations well. Explained about the treatment actions to follow.
I believe no costly medicines were prescribed unnecessarily.
They have x ray , pharmacy and physio facilities available at the same venue. The staff is friendly *** **** ********

He didn't even see the affected area which was swollen and causing severe pain. Just went on beautifully describing and explaining it as another serious non-recoverable problem and quickly made me to get some x-rays done in his own clinic. No option is given. I went to two other doctors who saw and touched the affected area and cleared within one hour.

The medicines in his own pharma are also sold at high price than MRP. No bill is given for that. I repent for having visited there and lost a good amount of money within 2 hrs.

VISIT AT YOUR OWN RISK AND HEAVY COST...
reply_text:
Thanks for the feedback. You had visited  on 12 sep with pain in low back and neck. I enquired about morning stiffness / pain in the morning for past 3-6months, you mentioned yes. I told I may have to rule out ANKYLOSING SPONDYLITIS considering your age. Yes I explained beautifully regarding your condition I suspected, I examined your  lumbar and cervical spine , and if l am not wrong you mentioned about the painful part in low back, i examined and said that part usually has muscles. I mentioned about having x-rays done , never pressurised to get it done. My consultation charge is 250. I follow ethical practice, if my treatment has not helped you, I shall take note. Coming to pharmacy, billing more than MRP, can we really do that? I had prescribed 4 tablets. You have purchased one painkiller injection and methycobal injection your pharmacy bill no is 0003904 and amount collected is rs 139.50. Ours is electronic bill. I can send your copy on your mail. Either our staff has forgot to handover the bill or you might have forgotten to collect. Now

1 Definitely I would not be able to cure your pain in one hour, I admit on that. 

2 x-ray of LS AND CERVICAL SPINE was advised and mentioned about why I am suggesting. I never told you have to get the x-ray done or else I will not examine or advise. So I shall not agree with option not given. 

3 I also told you to browse in the net regarding ANKYLOSING SPONDYLITIS and understand better regarding your symptoms.

4 If you have purchased more than 2 injections  or paid more than rs 139.50,  I shall refund double the amount . If you are charged more than MRP I shall close the centre. We have CCTV at the pharmacy, if you want we can examine the same.

 
Thanks,

review: We were waiting at the chamber for more than 30mims . the doctor never turned up. There was no communication from his end for the delay. the Chamber staff were not able to connect to him.Very dissappointed with the level of service. Wont recommend to anyone

Dr. Naveen Devarajaiah is a very professional doctor and is passionate about his profession. He spends good amount of time with the patients and explains the case in detail and answers all your queries without any ambiguity. The staff is very friendly and supportive. ******** **** ** *** ** *** **** ********** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Naveen was very knowledgeable and could identify the issue promptly. He was also very patiently explaining the issue, the treatment and care procedures. Highly recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Started physio a week before at NDR with Dr. Arjun Kumar Jha (pt). My feet pain caused by injury has reduced drastically within a week. The physio done by the aforesaid doctor is excellent. Dr. Navim has also been at par at recommending treatment n medicines. Made a great difference to my feet. Highly recommended for all issues related to bones.
*** ** *** **** ******** ** ********* ***********I have improved a lot n feel fit and fine.
Came here with high hope of getting normal. Thanks that i am going happily after my treatment here.

I had injury in the Lt thumb and had taken treatment at local clinic but later it had become black and pus was coming from the wound.the doctor explained the requirement for small procedure. I agreed and it was done immediately. Today dressing was done and I am happy with the result. I am thankful to doctor and staff .

I had sustained fracture wrist joint on 29 Feb , immediately I was taken to surgery at the centre and I went home the same day. I was happy with the care given by the doctor and staff. I along with my parents were explained regarding the fracture and treatment by the Doctor patiently and in friendly manner. I would recommend this doctor.
Visited a month back & Suggested surgery now for simple issue .  Paid for  physiotherapy for 13 visits

When I just entered after taking appointment , staff took me to doctor directly, doctor explained well about what I was going through and what has to be done further.

Thanks Doctor and staff,
Good explanation , good treatment solution suggestion. Doctor advised well and diagnosed properly taking time
Not satisfied at all and he did not give clarity on the treatment and i have to visit again another today , i spent a huge amount here
reply_text: Apologies first. Probably i would have asked you to come after 5 days for review. I would have asked you to take physiotherapy. Have you taken the prescribed treatment? You had   sr uric acid test and xray done. Kindly understand our body doesn't respond uniformly. Sometimes we require to re-evaluate if pain doesn't decrease. If possible send your prescription and reports online, will respond to it.  Well at the end of the day I am just a doctor. Thanks
